snippet: IBM says a new division, with 2,500 employees, will be devoted to the supercomputer’s so-called data analysis and recommendation technology.
abstract: IBM says a new division, with 2,500 employees, will be devoted to the Watson supercomputer’s so-called data analysis and recommendation technology.
lead_paragraph: IBM says a new division, with 2,500 employees, will be devoted to the supercomputer’s so-called data analysis and recommendation technology.

headline.main: IBM Is Betting That Watson Can Earn Its Keep
